summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated July 11, 2019, regarding the defendant's bail submission. The sender attaches a bail memo and mentions returning from court and preparing to swear out a warrant.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, mentions returning from court and preparing to swear out a warrant, and attaches a bail memo.

events.title: Bail Submission and Warrant Swearing
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails about the defendant's bail submission and mentions having to go back to swear out a warrant at 12:45.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 11, 2019, from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email discusses the defendant's bail submission and attaches a bail memo and related documents.
The prosecutor mentions having just returned from court and needing to go back to swear out a warrant at 12:45.
